title: silence nuget feeds used
body:
### Steps to reproduce

Run on any project the next command

```
msbuild Xpand.Utils.csproj /v:m
```
### Expected  behavior
I would like to stop nuget polluting my logs with repeat information. Think a many projects solution you repeatably get the feeds used per project as I posted in the actual behaviour  

### Actual behavior
```
Microsoft (R) Build Engine version 15.9.20+g88f5fadfbe for .NET Framework
Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation. All rights reserved.

          1 file(s) moved.
  Feeds used:
    C:\Users\Tolis\.nuget\packages\
    https://api.nuget.org/v3/index.json
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft SDKs\NuGetPackages\
    C:\Program Files (x86)\DevExpress 18.2\Components\System\Components\Packages
    C:\Program Files (x86)\DevExpress 18.2\\Components\System\Components\packages
    https://xpandnugetserver.azurewebsites.net/nuget

  All packages listed in C:\Work\eXpandFramework\expand\Xpand\Xpand.Utils\packages.config are already installed.
  Xpand.Utils -> C:\Work\eXpandFramework\expand\Xpand.DLL\Xpand.Utils.dll
```

### Environment data
15.9.20.62856

nodes.body: This issue was moved to NuGet/Home#7662
